import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Api } from '../API/Api' import { endPoints } from '../API/Endpoint' const ChangePassword = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const changePasscode = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const reqpayload = { confirmPassword: e.target.confirmpassword.value, currentPassword: e.target.currpassword.value, newPassword: e.target.newpassword.value } console.log(reqpayload) Api.post(endPoints.UPDATE_USER_DETAIL, reqpayload).then((res) => { console.log(res) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } return ( <>

) } export default ChangePassword
